item.title: Rethinking Reconstruction-based Graph-Level Anomaly Detection: Limitations and a Simple Remedy
item.description: MUSE, a novel graph anomaly detection method, leverages multifaceted summaries of reconstruction errors, achieving state-of-the-art performance by addressing limitations of existing Graph-AE-based met…
